p.s: The Sonnet number 60 by William Shakespeare is one of his 154 lyrical works of art, probably written between 1592 and 1598.
In contrary to most of his poems, it is not mains about love, but about time with reference to love.
Shakespeare wants to clarify that we all should enjoy our life, independent of the death.
To make Sonnet 60 more understandable for Today'stoday's society, I will bring the sonnet into modern language:
